00048   LaAssemblageConversion::LaAssemblageConversion(QWidget* parent, Qt::WFlags fl)
00049 : QDialog(parent,fl)
00050 {
00051   //required by Qt4 to initialise the ui
00052   setupUi(this);
00053   readSettings();
00054 
00055 //  connect(pbnInsert, SIGNAL(clicked()),
00056  //     this, SLOT(on_pbnInsert_clicked()));
00057 
00058   tblAnimals->setColumnCount(5);
00059   //populate the animals combo
00060   LaUtils::AnimalMap myAnimalsMap;
00061   myAnimalsMap = LaUtils::getAvailableAnimals();
00062   QMapIterator<QString, LaAnimal> myIterator(myAnimalsMap);
00063   while (myIterator.hasNext())
00064   {
00065     myIterator.next();
00066     LaAnimal myAnimal = myIterator.value();
00067     QString myGuid = myAnimal.guid();
00068     QString myName = myAnimal.name();
00069     QIcon myIcon;
00070     myIcon.addFile(":/localdata.png");
00071     cboAnimal->addItem(myName,myGuid);
00072   }
00073 }

00083 void LaAssemblageConversion::readSettings()
00084 {
00085   QSettings mySettings;
00086   QPoint pos = mySettings.value("mainwindow/pos", QPoint(200, 200)).toPoint();
00087   QSize size = mySettings.value("mainwindow/size", QSize(400, 400)).toSize();
00088   resize(size);
00089   move(pos);
00090 }
00091 
00092 void LaAssemblageConversion::writeSettings()
00093 {
00094   QSettings mySettings;
00095   mySettings.setValue("mainwindow/pos", pos());
00096   mySettings.setValue("mainwindow/size", size());
00097 }

00106 void LaAssemblageConversion::on_pbnInsert_clicked()
00107 {
00108   // add an animal to the table
00109   qDebug() << "pbnInsert";
00110   int myRowCount = tblAnimals->rowCount();
00111 
00112   qDebug() << "rowCount: " << myRowCount;
00113   if (rbManual->isChecked() == true)
00114   {
00115     qDebug() << "manual is checked";
00116     // add item to table from manual inputs
00117     tblAnimals->insertRow(myRowCount);
00118 
00119     QString myName = leAnimal->text();
00120     int myUsableMeat = sbUsableMeat->value();
00121     int myCalsPerKg = sbCalsPerKg->value();
00122     float myNumber = dsbNumber->value();
00123 
00124     QTableWidgetItem *mypNameItem = new QTableWidgetItem(myName);
00125     tblAnimals->setItem(myRowCount, 0, mypNameItem);
00126     qDebug() << "myName = " << myName;
00127 
00128     QTableWidgetItem *mypUsableMeatItem= new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(myUsableMeat));
00129     tblAnimals->setItem(myRowCount, 2, mypUsableMeatItem);
00130 
00131     QTableWidgetItem *mypCalsPerKgItem= new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(myCalsPerKg));
00132     tblAnimals->setItem(myRowCount, 3, mypCalsPerKgItem);
00133 
00134     QTableWidgetItem *mypNumber= new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(myNumber));
00135     tblAnimals->setItem(myRowCount, 1, mypNumber);
00136     //tblAnimals->insertRow(myRowCount);
00137   }
00138   else if (rbAuto->isChecked() == true)
00139   {
00140     // add item to table from pre-defined animals
00141     qDebug() << "auto is checked";
00142     LaAnimal myAnimal = LaUtils::getAnimal( cboAnimal->itemData( cboAnimal->currentIndex(), Qt::UserRole).toString());
00143     tblAnimals->insertRow(myRowCount);
00144 
00145     QString myName = myAnimal.name();
00146     int myUsableMeatPercent = myAnimal.usableMeat();
00147     int myKillWeight = myAnimal.killWeight();
00148     int myCalsPerKg = myAnimal.meatFoodValue();
00149     float myUsableMeat = (0.01*myUsableMeatPercent) * myKillWeight;
00150     float myNumber = dsbNumber->value();
00151 
00152     QTableWidgetItem *mypNameItem = new QTableWidgetItem(myName);
00153     tblAnimals->setItem(myRowCount, 0, mypNameItem);
00154     qDebug() << "myName = " << myName;
00155 
00156     QTableWidgetItem *mypUsableMeatItem= new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(myUsableMeat));
00157     tblAnimals->setItem(myRowCount, 2, mypUsableMeatItem);
00158 
00159     QTableWidgetItem *mypCalsPerKgItem= new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(myCalsPerKg));
00160     tblAnimals->setItem(myRowCount, 3, mypCalsPerKgItem);
00161 
00162 
00163     QTableWidgetItem *mypNumber= new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(myNumber));
00164     tblAnimals->setItem(myRowCount, 1, mypNumber);
00165   }
00166   else
00167     {
00168       qDebug() << "nothing selected, just returning";
00169       return;
00170     }
00171   return;
00172 }

00174 void LaAssemblageConversion::on_pbnCalculate_clicked()
00175 {
00176   // calculate the percent of diet based on entries in tblAnimals
00177 
00178   // iterate through the table and get a sum of the adjusted meat value
00179   // which is the NISP * weight of usable meat * calories per kg
00180   float myAdjustmentSum = 0.0;
00181   float myContributionToDiet = 0.0;
00182   // iterate through table
00183   for (int myCurrentRow=0; myCurrentRow < tblAnimals->rowCount(); myCurrentRow++)
00184   {
00185     //QTableWidgetItem * mypNameWidget        = tblAnimals->item(myCurrentRow,0);
00186     QTableWidgetItem * mypNumberWidget      = tblAnimals->item(myCurrentRow,1);
00187     QTableWidgetItem * mypUsableMeatWidget  = tblAnimals->item(myCurrentRow,2);
00188     QTableWidgetItem * mypCalsPerKgWidget   = tblAnimals->item(myCurrentRow,3);
00189 
00190     myAdjustmentSum += (mypNumberWidget->text().toFloat())
00191                      * (mypUsableMeatWidget->text().toInt())
00192                      * (mypCalsPerKgWidget->text().toInt())
00193                      * 0.001; // to keep figures within limits
00194     qDebug() << "row: " << myCurrentRow <<" Adjustment sum: " << myAdjustmentSum;
00195   }
00196   // iterate table again, adding percentage contribution to diet
00197   float myDebugSumCheck = 0.0;
00198   for (int myCurrentRow1=0; myCurrentRow1 < tblAnimals->rowCount(); myCurrentRow1++)
00199   {
00200     QTableWidgetItem * mypNumberWidget      = tblAnimals->item(myCurrentRow1,1);
00201     QTableWidgetItem * mypUsableMeatWidget  = tblAnimals->item(myCurrentRow1,2);
00202     QTableWidgetItem * mypCalsPerKgWidget   = tblAnimals->item(myCurrentRow1,3);
00203 
00204     myContributionToDiet = (((mypNumberWidget->text().toFloat())
00205                      * (mypUsableMeatWidget->text().toInt())
00206                      * (mypCalsPerKgWidget->text().toInt())
00207                      * 0.001)
00208                      / myAdjustmentSum)
00209                      * 100.0; // to make it percent (ie. 10.56% instead of 0.1056)
00210    myDebugSumCheck += myContributionToDiet;
00211     QTableWidgetItem *mypContributionToDiet= new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(myContributionToDiet));
00212     tblAnimals->setItem(myCurrentRow1, 4, mypContributionToDiet);
00213     qDebug() << "debug sum check: " << myDebugSumCheck;
00214   }
00215   qDebug() << "Final debug sum (should be 100) : " << myDebugSumCheck;
00216 
00217 
00218 }

00220 void LaAssemblageConversion::on_pbnSave_clicked()
00221 {
00222   QString myString= "Name,Number,UsableMeat,CalsPerKg,PercentDiet";
00223   myString += "\n";
00224   for (int myCurrentRow=0; myCurrentRow < tblAnimals->rowCount(); myCurrentRow++)
00225   {
00226     QTableWidgetItem * mypNameWidget          = tblAnimals->item(myCurrentRow,0);
00227     QTableWidgetItem * mypNumberWidget        = tblAnimals->item(myCurrentRow,1);
00228     QTableWidgetItem * mypUsableMeatWidget    = tblAnimals->item(myCurrentRow,2);
00229     QTableWidgetItem * mypCalsPerKgWidget     = tblAnimals->item(myCurrentRow,3);
00230     QTableWidgetItem * mypContributionToDiet  = tblAnimals->item(myCurrentRow,4);
00231 
00232     myString += mypNameWidget->text()         + ",";
00233     myString += mypNumberWidget->text()       + ",";
00234     myString += mypUsableMeatWidget->text()   + ",";
00235     myString += mypCalsPerKgWidget->text()    + ",";
00236     myString += mypContributionToDiet->text() + ",";
00237     myString += "\n";
00238   }
00239 
00240   LaUtils myUtils;
00241   QString myFileName = myUtils.saveFile();
00242   myUtils.createTextFile(myFileName, myString);
00243   return;
00244 }

00257 bool LaAssemblageConversion::setComboToDefault(QComboBox * thepCombo, QString theDefault)
00258 {
00259   if (!theDefault.isEmpty())
00260   {
00261     //loop through list looking for a match
00262     for ( int myCounter = 0; myCounter < thepCombo->count(); myCounter++ )
00263     {
00264       thepCombo->setCurrentIndex(myCounter);
00265 
00266       if (thepCombo->itemData(myCounter,Qt::UserRole)==theDefault)
00267       {
00268         break;
00269       }
00270     }
00271   }
00272   else
00273   {
00274     return false;
00275   }
00276   return true;
00277 }
